mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_PIC (POST_PIC_SEQ, PATH, FILE_NAME, POST_SEQ) values (#{postPicSeq }, #{path }, #{fileName }, #{postSeq })
insert into post_pic values(null, #{path }, #{fileName }, (select max(post_seq) as postSeq from post where usr_seq = 14), now())
mapper.select: SELECT POST_PIC_SEQ as postPicSeq, PATH as path, FILE_NAME as fileName, POST_SEQ as postSeq, CRT_DATE as crtDate FROM POST_PIC
select file_name as fileName from post_pic pp, post p where pp.post_seq = p.post_seq and pp.post_seq = #{postSeq }
SELECT POST_PIC_SEQ as postPicSeq, PATH as path, FILE_NAME as fileName, POST_SEQ as postSeq, CRT_DATE as crtDate FROM POST_PIC WHERE POST_PIC_SEQ = #{integer }

select pp.file_name as fileName, pp.post_pic_seq as postPicSeq, pp.path as path from post as po INNER join travel_info as ti on po.trv_seq = ti.trv_seq left outer join post_pic as pp on po.POST_SEQ = pp.post_seq where po.REVIEW_PUB_YN='Y' and po.post_seq=#{postSeq}
